ModernDocking 0.11.0-SNAPSHOT Help

Customization Points

Docking Settings

Handle Colors

background and foreground

Tab Placement

By default, Modern Docking places all tabs in JTabbePanes at the bottom. This can be changed using Settings.alwaysDisplayTabsMode which will switch the tab placement to the top.

Tab Layout Policy

The tab layout policy of JTabbedPane can be customized with Settings.setTabLayoutPolicy. The default tab layout policy is JTabbedPane.SCROLL_TAB_LAYOUT and it can be set to either JTabbedPane.SCROLL_TAB_LAYOUT or JTabbedPane.WRAP_TAB_LAYOUT.
